# SHARK4R: Accessing and Validating Marine Environmental Data from ‘SHARK’ and Related Databases

## Overview

This R package is equipped with a client application designed for
integration with API functions. It facilitates access to various
databases, including [SHARK](https://shark.smhi.se/en/), [SLU
Artdatabanken (Dyntaxa)](https://artfakta.se/),
[WoRMS](https://www.marinespecies.org/rest/),
[AlgaeBase](https://www.algaebase.org/), [IOC-UNESCO Taxonomic Reference
List of Harmful Micro Algae](https://www.marinespecies.org/hab/),
[IOC-UNESCO Toxins database](https://toxins.hais.ioc-unesco.org/), [OBIS
xylookup web service](https://iobis.github.io/xylookup/) and [Nordic
Microalgae](https://nordicmicroalgae.org/). The package serves a dual
purpose, supporting both data analysis and automatic quality control of
physical, chemical, and marine biological data. Several quality control
components, originally developed by Provoost and Bosch (2018), have been
adapted for compatibility with the SHARK format.

## Installation

You can install the latest version of `SHARK4R` from CRAN using:

``` r
install.packages("SHARK4R")
```

Or install the development version (requiring the `remotes` package):

``` r
# install.packages("remotes")
remotes::install_github("sharksmhi/SHARK4R", 
                        dependencies = TRUE)
```

## Documentation and Tutorials

### Website

For detailed information, please visit the project’s
[webpage](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/).

### Tutorials

Explore the features and capabilities of `SHARK4R` through these
tutorials:

- [Retrieve Data From
  SHARK](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/articles/retrieve_shark_data.html)
- [Retrieve Data From
  Dyntaxa](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/articles/retrieve_dyntaxa_data.html)
- [Retrieve Data From
  WoRMS](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/articles/retrieve_worms_data.html)
- [Retrieve Data From
  AlgaeBase](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/articles/retrieve_algaebase_data.html)
- [Retrieve Data From IOC HAB and Toxin
  databases](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/articles/retrieve_hab_data.html)
- [Retrieve Data From Nordic
  Microalgae](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/articles/retrieve_nordic_microalgae_data.html)
- [Quality Control of SHARK
  Data](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/articles/quality_control.html)

### Reference

For a detailed overview of all available `SHARK4R` functions, please
visit the reference section:

- [Function
  Reference](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/index.html)

## Repository

For more details and the latest updates, visit the [GitHub
repository](https://github.com/sharksmhi/SHARK4R/).

## License

This package is licensed under the MIT License.

## References

Provoost P, Bosch S (2024). `obistools`: Tools for data enhancement and
quality control. Ocean Biodiversity Information System.
Intergovernmental Oceanographic Commission of UNESCO. R package version
0.1.0, <https://iobis.github.io/obistools/>.

# Package index

## Retrieve Data

### SHARK

These functions are used to retrieve and read data from SHARK

- [`get_shark_options()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/get_shark_options.md)
  : Retrieve available search options from SHARK
- [`get_shark_codes()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/get_shark_codes.md)
  : Get SHARK codelist from SMHI
- [`get_shark_data()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/get_shark_data.md)
  : Retrieve tabular data from SHARK
- [`get_shark_datasets()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/get_shark_datasets.md)
  : Download SHARK dataset zip archives
- [`get_shark_statistics()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/get_shark_statistics.md)
  : Summarize numeric SHARK parameters with ranges and outlier
  thresholds
- [`get_shark_table_counts()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/get_shark_table_counts.md)
  : Retrieve SHARK data table row counts
- [`read_shark()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/read_shark.md)
  : Read SHARK export files (tab- or semicolon-delimited, plain text or
  zipped)
- [`read_shark_deliv()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/read_shark_deliv.md)
  : Read SHARK Excel delivery files (.xls or .xlsx)

### Dyntaxa

These functions are used to retrieve data from the Dyntaxa API

- [`construct_dyntaxa_table()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/construct_dyntaxa_table.md)
  : Construct a hierarchical taxonomy table from Dyntaxa
- [`get_dyntaxa_dwca()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/get_dyntaxa_dwca.md)
  : Download and read Darwin Core Archive files from Dyntaxa
- [`get_dyntaxa_parent_ids()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/get_dyntaxa_parent_ids.md)
  : Get parent taxon IDs for specified taxon IDs from Dyntaxa
- [`get_dyntaxa_records()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/get_dyntaxa_records.md)
  : Get taxonomic information from Dyntaxa for specified taxon IDs
- [`is_in_dyntaxa()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/is_in_dyntaxa.md)
  : Check if taxon names exist in Dyntaxa
- [`match_dyntaxa_taxa()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/match_dyntaxa_taxa.md)
  : Match Dyntaxa taxon names
- [`update_dyntaxa_taxonomy()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/update_dyntaxa_taxonomy.md)
  : Update SHARK taxonomy records using Dyntaxa

### WoRMS

These functions are used to retrieve data from the WoRMS API

- [`add_worms_taxonomy()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/add_worms_taxonomy.md)
  : Add WoRMS taxonomy hierarchy to AphiaIDs or scientific names
- [`assign_phytoplankton_group()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/assign_phytoplankton_group.md)
  : Assign phytoplankton group to scientific names
- [`get_worms_classification()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/get_worms_classification.md)
  : Retrieve hierarchical classification from WoRMS
- [`get_worms_records()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/get_worms_records.md)
  : Retrieve WoRMS records
- [`get_worms_taxonomy_tree()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/get_worms_taxonomy_tree.md)
  : Retrieve hierarchical taxonomy data from WoRMS
- [`match_worms_taxa()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/match_worms_taxa.md)
  : Retrieve WoRMS records by taxonomic names with retry logic

### AlgaeBase

These functions are used to retrieve data from the AlgaeBase API

- [`match_algaebase_genus()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/match_algaebase_genus.md)
  : Search AlgaeBase for information about a genus of algae
- [`match_algaebase_species()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/match_algaebase_species.md)
  : Search AlgaeBase for information about a species of algae
- [`match_algaebase_taxa()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/match_algaebase_taxa.md)
  : Search AlgaeBase for taxonomic information
- [`parse_scientific_names()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/parse_scientific_names.md)
  : Parse scientific names into genus and species components.

### IOC-UNESCO HAB

These functions are used to retrieve data from the IOC-UNESCO Taxonomic
Reference List of Harmful Micro Algae and the IOC-UNESCO Toxins
database.

- [`get_hab_list()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/get_hab_list.md)
  : Download the IOC-UNESCO Taxonomic Reference List of Harmful Micro
  Algae
- [`get_toxin_list()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/get_toxin_list.md)
  : Retrieve marine biotoxin data from IOC-UNESCO Toxins Database

### Nordic Microalgae

These functions are used to retrieve data from the Nordic Microalgae API

- [`get_nua_external_links()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/get_nua_external_links.md)
  : Retrieve external links or facts for taxa from Nordic Microalgae
- [`get_nua_harmfulness()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/get_nua_harmfulness.md)
  : Retrieve harmfulness for taxa from Nordic Microalgae
- [`get_nua_media_links()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/get_nua_media_links.md)
  : Retrieve and extract media URLs from Nordic Microalgae
- [`get_nua_taxa()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/get_nua_taxa.md)
  : Retrieve taxa information from Nordic Microalgae

### Plankton Toolbox

These functions are used to read data related to Plankton Toolbox

- [`get_nomp_list()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/get_nomp_list.md)
  : Get the latest NOMP biovolume Excel list
- [`get_peg_list()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/get_peg_list.md)
  : Get the latest EG-Phyto/PEG biovolume Excel list
- [`read_ptbx()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/read_ptbx.md)
  : Read a Plankton Toolbox export file

## Quality Control

### Geographical Data Checks

- [`check_nominal_station()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/check_nominal_station.md)
  : Check if stations are reported as nominal positions
- [`check_onland()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/check_onland.md)
  : Check whether points are located on land
- [`check_station_distance()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/check_station_distance.md)
  : Check station distances against SMHI station list
- [`check_zero_positions()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/check_zero_positions.md)
  : Identify samples with zero-valued station coordinates
- [`lookup_xy()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/lookup_xy.md)
  : Lookup spatial information for geographic points
- [`match_station()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/match_station.md)
  : Match station names against SMHI station list
- [`plot_map_leaflet()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/plot_map_leaflet.md)
  : Create an interactive Leaflet map of sampling stations
- [`positions_are_near_land()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/positions_are_near_land.md)
  : Determine if positions are near land
- [`which_basin()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/which_basin.md)
  : Determine if points are in a specified sea basin

### SHARK Data Checks

- [`check_codes()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/check_codes.md)
  : Check matches of reported codes in SMHI's SHARK codelist
- [`check_datatype()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/check_datatype.md)
  : Validate SHARK system fields in a data frame
- [`check_depth()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/check_depth.md)
  : Validate depth values against bathymetry and logical constraints
- [`check_fields()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/check_fields.md)
  : Validate SHARK data fields for a given datatype
- [`check_logical_parameter()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/check_logical_parameter.md)
  : General checker for parameter-specific logical rules
- [`check_outliers()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/check_outliers.md)
  : General outlier check function for SHARK data
- [`check_parameter_rules()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/check_parameter_rules.md)
  : Check parameter values against logical rules
- [`check_setup()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/check_setup.md)
  : Download and set up SHARK4R support files
- [`check_value_logical()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/check_value_logical.md)
  : Identify non-numeric or non-logical values in measurement data
- [`check_zero_value()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/check_zero_value.md)
  : Identify records with zero-valued measurement data
- [`run_qc_app()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/run_qc_app.md)
  : Launch the SHARK4R Bio-QC Tool

### MISC

- [`clean_shark4r_cache()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/clean_shark4r_cache.md)
  : Clean SHARK4R cache by file age and session
- [`convert_ddmm_to_dd()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/convert_ddmm_to_dd.md)
  : Convert coordinates from DDMM format to decimal degrees
- [`find_required_fields()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/find_required_fields.md)
  : Find required fields in a SHARK delivery template
- [`get_delivery_template()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/get_delivery_template.md)
  : Get a delivery template for a SHARK datatype
- [`load_shark4r_stats()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/load_shark4r_stats.md)
  : Load SHARK4R statistics from GitHub
- [`load_shark4r_fields()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/load_shark4r_fields.md)
  : Load SHARK4R fields from GitHub
- [`scatterplot()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/scatterplot.md)
  : Scatterplot with optional horizontal threshold lines
- [`translate_shark_datatype()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/translate_shark_datatype.md)
  : Translate SHARK4R datatype names

## Deprecated functions

- [`check_Bacterioplankton()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/check_Bacterioplankton.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Check if the required and recommended
  datatype-specific SHARK system fields are present
- [`check_Chlorophyll()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/check_Chlorophyll.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Check if the required and recommended
  datatype-specific SHARK system fields are present
- [`check_Epibenthos()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/check_Epibenthos.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Check if the required and recommended
  datatype-specific SHARK system fields are present
- [`check_EpibenthosDropvideo()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/check_EpibenthosDropvideo.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Check if the required and recommended
  datatype-specific SHARK system fields are present
- [`check_GreySeal()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/check_GreySeal.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Check if the required and recommended
  datatype-specific SHARK system fields are present
- [`check_HarbourPorpoise()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/check_HarbourPorpoise.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Check if the required and recommended
  datatype-specific SHARK system fields are present
- [`check_HarbourSeal()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/check_HarbourSeal.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Check if the required and recommended
  datatype-specific SHARK system fields are present
- [`check_PhysicalChemical()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/check_PhysicalChemical.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Check if the required and recommended
  datatype-specific SHARK system fields are present
- [`check_Phytoplankton()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/check_Phytoplankton.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Check if the required and recommended
  datatype-specific SHARK system fields are present
- [`check_Picoplankton()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/check_Picoplankton.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Check if the required and recommended
  datatype-specific SHARK system fields are present
- [`check_PrimaryProduction()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/check_PrimaryProduction.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Check if the required and recommended
  datatype-specific SHARK system fields are present
- [`check_RingedSeal()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/check_RingedSeal.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Check if the required and recommended
  datatype-specific SHARK system fields are present
- [`check_SealPathology()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/check_SealPathology.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Check if the required and recommended
  datatype-specific SHARK system fields are present
- [`check_Sedimentation()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/check_Sedimentation.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Check if the required and recommended
  datatype-specific SHARK system fields are present
- [`check_Zoobenthos()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/check_Zoobenthos.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Check if the required and recommended
  datatype-specific SHARK system fields are present
- [`check_Zooplankton()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/check_Zooplankton.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Check if the required and recommended
  datatype-specific SHARK system fields are present
- [`check_bacterial_carbon()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/check_bacterial_carbon.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Uses data from national marine monitoring for the
  last 5 years to identify outliers
- [`check_bacterial_concentration()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/check_bacterial_concentration.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Uses data from national marine monitoring for the
  last 5 years to identify outliers
- [`check_bacterial_production()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/check_bacterial_production.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Uses data from national marine monitoring for the
  last 5 years to identify outliers
- [`check_chlorophyll_conc()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/check_chlorophyll_conc.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Uses data from national marine monitoring for the
  last 5 years to identify outliers
- [`check_code_proj()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/check_code_proj.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Check matches of reported codes in SMHI's SHARK
  codelist
- [`check_deliv_Bacterioplankton()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/check_deliv_Bacterioplankton.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Check if the required and recommended
  datatype-specific SHARK system fields are present
- [`check_deliv_Chlorophyll()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/check_deliv_Chlorophyll.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Check if the required and recommended
  datatype-specific SHARK system fields are present
- [`check_deliv_Epibenthos()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/check_deliv_Epibenthos.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Check if the required and recommended
  datatype-specific SHARK system fields are present
- [`check_deliv_EpibenthosDropvideo()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/check_deliv_EpibenthosDropvideo.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Check if the required and recommended
  datatype-specific SHARK system fields are present
- [`check_deliv_GreySeal()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/check_deliv_GreySeal.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Check if the required and recommended
  datatype-specific SHARK system fields are present

  **\[deprecated\]** : Check if the required and recommended
  datatype-specific SHARK system fields are present

  **\[deprecated\]** : Check if the required and recommended
  datatype-specific SHARK system fields are present

  **\[deprecated\]** : Check if the required and recommended
  datatype-specific SHARK system fields are present
- [`check_deliv_Phytoplankton()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/check_deliv_Phytoplankton.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Check if the required and recommended
  datatype-specific SHARK system fields are present
- [`check_deliv_Picoplankton()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/check_deliv_Picoplankton.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Check if the required and recommended
  datatype-specific SHARK system fields are present
- [`check_deliv_PrimaryProduction()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/check_deliv_PrimaryProduction.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Check if the required and recommended
  datatype-specific SHARK system fields are present
- [`check_deliv_RingedSeal()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/check_deliv_RingedSeal.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Check if the required and recommended
  datatype-specific SHARK system fields are present
- [`check_deliv_SealPathology()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/check_deliv_SealPathology.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Check if the required and recommended
  datatype-specific SHARK system fields are present
- [`check_deliv_Sedimentation()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/check_deliv_Sedimentation.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Check if the required and recommended
  datatype-specific SHARK system fields are present
- [`check_deliv_Zoobenthos()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/check_deliv_Zoobenthos.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Check if the required and recommended
  datatype-specific SHARK system fields are present
- [`check_deliv_Zooplankton()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/check_deliv_Zooplankton.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Check if the required and recommended
  datatype-specific SHARK system fields are present
- [`check_epibenthos_abundclass_logical()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/check_epibenthos_abundclass_logical.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Check if Abundance class exceeds 10
- [`check_epibenthos_counted()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/check_epibenthos_counted.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Uses data from national marine monitoring for the
  last 5 years to identify outliers
- [`check_epibenthos_cover_logical()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/check_epibenthos_cover_logical.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Check if Epibenthos cover exceeds 100%
- [`check_epibenthos_coverclass_logical()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/check_epibenthos_coverclass_logical.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Check if Epibenthos cover class exceeds 10
- [`check_epibenthos_coverpercent_logical()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/check_epibenthos_coverpercent_logical.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Check if Epibenthos cover (%) exceeds 100%
- [`check_epibenthos_dryweight()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/check_epibenthos_dryweight.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Uses data from national marine monitoring for the
  last 5 years to identify outliers
- [`check_epibenthos_sedimentdepos_logical()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/check_epibenthos_sedimentdepos_logical.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Check if Sediment deposition cover (%) exceeds
  100%
- [`check_epibenthos_specdistr_maxdepth()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/check_epibenthos_specdistr_maxdepth.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Uses data from national marine monitoring for the
  last 5 years to identify outliers
- [`check_epibenthos_specdistr_mindepth()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/check_epibenthos_specdistr_mindepth.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Uses data from national marine monitoring for the
  last 5 years to identify outliers
- [`check_epibenthos_totcover_logical()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/check_epibenthos_totcover_logical.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Check if Epibenthos total cover exceeds 100%
- [`check_greyseal_counted()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/check_greyseal_counted.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Uses data from national marine monitoring for the
  last 5 years to identify outliers
- [`check_harbourseal_counted()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/check_harbourseal_counted.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Uses data from national marine monitoring for the
  last 5 years to identify outliers
- [`check_harbporp_positivemin()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/check_harbporp_positivemin.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Uses data from national marine monitoring for the
  last 5 years to identify outliers
- [`check_phytoplankton_abund()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/check_phytoplankton_abund.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Uses data from national marine monitoring for the
  last 5 years to identify outliers
- [`check_phytoplankton_biovol()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/check_phytoplankton_biovol.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Uses data from national marine monitoring for the
  last 5 years to identify outliers
- [`check_phytoplankton_carbon()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/check_phytoplankton_carbon.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Uses data from national marine monitoring for the
  last 5 years to identify outliers
- [`check_phytoplankton_counted()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/check_phytoplankton_counted.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Uses data from national marine monitoring for the
  last 5 years to identify outliers
- [`check_picoplankton_abundance()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/check_picoplankton_abundance.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Uses data from national marine monitoring for the
  last 5 years to identify outliers
- [`check_picoplankton_biovol()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/check_picoplankton_biovol.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Uses data from national marine monitoring for the
  last 5 years to identify outliers
- [`check_picoplankton_carbon()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/check_picoplankton_carbon.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Uses data from national marine monitoring for the
  last 5 years to identify outliers
- [`check_picoplankton_counted()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/check_picoplankton_counted.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Uses data from national marine monitoring for the
  last 5 years to identify outliers
- [`check_primaryproduction_carbonprod()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/check_primaryproduction_carbonprod.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Uses data from national marine monitoring for the
  last 5 years to identify outliers
- [`check_primaryproduction_carbonprod_hour()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/check_primaryproduction_carbonprod_hour.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Uses data from national marine monitoring for the
  last 5 years to identify outliers
- [`check_primaryproduction_carbonprodlight()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/check_primaryproduction_carbonprodlight.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Uses data from national marine monitoring for the
  last 5 years to identify outliers
- [`check_ringedseal_calccounted()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/check_ringedseal_calccounted.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Uses data from national marine monitoring for the
  last 5 years to identify outliers
- [`check_zoobenthos_BQIm()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/check_zoobenthos_BQIm.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Uses data from national marine monitoring for the
  last 5 years to identify outliers
- [`check_zoobenthos_BQIm_logical()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/check_zoobenthos_BQIm_logical.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Check logical relationship between Abundance and
  BQIm
- [`check_zoobenthos_abund()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/check_zoobenthos_abund.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Uses data from national marine monitoring for the
  last 5 years to identify outliers
- [`check_zoobenthos_counted()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/check_zoobenthos_counted.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Uses data from national marine monitoring for the
  last 5 years to identify outliers
- [`check_zoobenthos_wetweight()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/check_zoobenthos_wetweight.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Uses data from national marine monitoring for the
  last 5 years to identify outliers
- [`check_zoobenthos_wetweight_logical()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/check_zoobenthos_wetweight_logical.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Check if wet weight measurements are zero
- [`check_zooplankton_abund()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/check_zooplankton_abund.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Uses data from national marine monitoring for the
  last 5 years to identify outliers
- [`check_zooplankton_carbon()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/check_zooplankton_carbon.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Uses data from national marine monitoring for the
  last 5 years to identify outliers
- [`check_zooplankton_counted()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/check_zooplankton_counted.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Uses data from national marine monitoring for the
  last 5 years to identify outliers
- [`check_zooplankton_length_mean()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/check_zooplankton_length_mean.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Uses data from national marine monitoring for the
  last 5 years to identify outliers
- [`check_zooplankton_length_median()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/check_zooplankton_length_median.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Uses data from national marine monitoring for the
  last 5 years to identify outliers
- [`check_zooplankton_wetweight()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/check_zooplankton_wetweight.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Uses data from national marine monitoring for the
  last 5 years to identify outliers
- [`check_zooplankton_wetweight_area()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/check_zooplankton_wetweight_area.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Uses data from national marine monitoring for the
  last 5 years to identify outliers
- [`check_zooplankton_wetweight_volume()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/check_zooplankton_wetweight_volume.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Uses data from national marine monitoring for the
  last 5 years to identify outliers
- [`get_algaebase_genus()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/get_algaebase_genus.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Search AlgaeBase for information about a genus of
  algae
- [`get_algaebase_species()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/get_algaebase_species.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Search AlgaeBase for information about a species
  of algae
- [`get_worms_records_name()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/get_worms_records_name.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Retrieve WoRMS records by taxonomic names with
  retry logic
- [`ifcb_is_near_land()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/ifcb_is_near_land.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Determine if positions are near land
- [`ifcb_which_basin()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/ifcb_which_basin.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Determine if points are in a specified sea basin
- [`match_algaebase()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/match_algaebase.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Search AlgaeBase for taxonomic information
- [`match_dyntaxa()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/match_dyntaxa.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Taxon matching using Dyntaxa
  (https://www.dyntaxa.se/)
- [`match_taxon_name()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/match_taxon_name.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Match Dyntaxa taxon names
- [`match_wormstaxa()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/match_wormstaxa.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Taxon matching using WoRMS
  (http://www.marinespecies.org/)
- [`nominal_station()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/nominal_station.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Check if stations are reported as nominal
  positions
- [`plot_map_leaflet_deliv()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/plot_map_leaflet_deliv.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Create a Leaflet map.
- [`shark_read()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/shark_read.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Read tab delimited files downloaded from SHARK
- [`shark_read_deliv()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/shark_read_deliv.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Read .xlsx files delivered to SHARK
- [`shark_read_deliv_xls()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/shark_read_deliv_xls.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Read .xls files delivered to SHARK
- [`shark_read_zip()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/shark_read_zip.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Read zip archive and unzip tab delimited files
  downloaded from SHARK
- [`update_worms_taxonomy()`](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/reference/update_worms_taxonomy.md)
  **\[deprecated\]** : Retrieve and organize WoRMS taxonomy for SHARK
  Aphia IDs

# Articles

### All vignettes

- [Quality Control of SHARK
  Data](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/articles/quality_control.md):
- [Retrieve Taxonomic Data From
  AlgaeBase](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/articles/retrieve_algaebase_data.md):
- [Retrieve Taxonomic Data From
  Dyntaxa](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/articles/retrieve_dyntaxa_data.md):
- [Retrieve HAB Data From IOC-UNESCO
  Databases](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/articles/retrieve_hab_data.md):
- [Retrieve Data From Nordic
  Microalgae](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/articles/retrieve_nordic_microalgae_data.md):
- [Retrieve Data From
  SHARK](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/articles/retrieve_shark_data.md):
- [Retrieve Taxonomic Data From
  WoRMS](https://sharksmhi.github.io/SHARK4R/articles/retrieve_worms_data.md):
